main.gol.model.filemanager

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.gol.model.filemanager.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    FileHandler class lets you choose a file, and gets the file type of the chosen file.

    theFileType and theFile gets updated with the correct file type values, and getters is used by other classes to retrieve the values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void choose()
      This method opens a new fileChooser and let you select .txt / .cells / .rle files.
      void fileSelect()
      fileSelect lets you choose a file and gets the file type value.
      void fileSelectType(java.io.File theFile)
      This method checks the file type (RLE or plaintext), and sets theFileType to the correct value.
      java.io.File getTheFile()
      This method returns theFile.
      java.lang.String getTheFileType()
      This method returns the fileType as a string.
      void setTheFile(java.io.File theFile)
      This method sets the file.

      • fileSelect

      • choose

        public void choose()
        This method opens a new fileChooser and let you select .txt / .cells / .rle files.

      • fileSelectType

        public void fileSelectType(java.io.File theFile)
        This method checks the file type (RLE or plaintext), and sets theFileType to the correct value. RLEDecoder is instantiated if RLE file is selected. Getters is used to retrieve the file tpye in other classes.
        Parameters:
        theFile - File
